thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 3 of 1729
thread.title: Darlene

author: Darlene
title: Darlene
text: I love FlightHub and it has become the only site I use whenever I need to find cheap flights. They always find the best prices, they allow you to request seat preferences for way less than if you actually seat select through an airline, and they do not charge any exorbitant additional charges for using their site. They are a user friendly website and I have never had a single reservation about using their services.
